recipe.name: Soufflé Omelette With Cheese
recipe.description: A light and fluffy omelette that combines the techniques of a classic soufflé with the simplicity of an omelette, resulting in a dish that's airy, cheesy, and perfect for breakfast or brunch.

ingredients.ingredient_name: Grated cheese (such as Gruyère, cheddar, or Swiss)

steps: In a medium bowl, beat egg yolks with a generous pinch of salt until slightly thickened.
In a separate clean bowl, using a whisk or electric mixer, beat egg whites to stiff peaks.
Fold half of the beaten egg whites into the yolks to lighten them, then gently fold in the remaining whites until just combined.
In a 10-inch nonstick skillet, melt butter over medium heat until foamy. Add the egg mixture and cook until the bottom is set and lightly browned, about 3 minutes.
Sprinkle cheese evenly over the top and season with black pepper. Cover the skillet and continue to cook until the cheese is melted and the top is set, about 2 minutes longer.
Using a spatula, fold the omelette in half and slide it onto a plate. Serve immediately.
